solution_line_template: Knowing that dogs live {dog_to_hamster_ratio} times the age of hamsters, dogs live {dog_to_hamster_ratio} * {hamster_lifespan} = <<{dog_to_hamster_ratio}*{hamster_lifespan}={dog_lifespan}>>{dog_lifespan} years.
If Ruth takes care of the fish, it can live {dog_lifespan} + {fish_lifespan_bonus} = <<{dog_lifespan}+{fish_lifespan_bonus}={fish_lifespan}>>{fish_lifespan} years.
